@@ -370,13 +370,13 @@ def test_url_explicit_exception_for_old_syntax_at_run_time(self):

         t = Template('{% url path.to.view %}')      # not quoted = old syntax

     def test_url_explicit_exception_for_old_syntax_at_compile_time(self):
